name: orion-demo-app-lambda
description: Lambda function for Orion demo app GraphQL API

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run copy-static && npm run package
scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p dist/graphql dist/db/json && cp src/graphql/schema.graphql dist/graphql/ && cp src/db/json/*.json dist/db/json/
scripts.package: npm run package:prepare && npm run package:zip
scripts.package:prepare: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp -r dist/* build/ && cp package.json build/ && cd build && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.package:zip: cd build && zip -r ../lambda-function.zip . && cd .. && cp lambda-function.zip ../assets/
